revision.text: Possibly: The orations of Lysias and Isocrates, translated from the Greek: with some account of their lives ; and a discourse on the history, manners, and character of the Greeks, from the conclusion of the Peloponnesian war, to the battle of Chaeronea. By John Gillies, LL. D. (London, 1778). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/181879541
